product_name: Showers Pass Skyline Bike Pants - Men's
long_description: Don't let cold, wintry weather derail your riding routine. The Showers Pass Skyline bike pants offer waterproof protection where you need it and stretch panels to ensure full range of motion. Polyester/nylon fabric blend features Elite(TM) waterproof, breathable panels at tops and bottoms of legs. Waterproof soft-shell fabric at knees and sides promotes breathability and temperature regulation without letting water sneak in. Drop-down ankle gaiters provide coverage when you skip the bike and strap on snowshoes. Reflective elements on the Showers Pass Skyline bike pants enhance visibility in low light; zippered side pocket secures small items.
short_description: Don't let cold, wintry weather derail your riding routine. The Showers Pass Skyline bike pants offer waterproof protection where you need it and stretch panels to ensure full range of motion.
